long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ROOSTER LESSON UPDATER for LingQ.com

Breaks down the hassle of editing the lessons as singular sentences, copy and delete multiple lines at once with this tool.

    BASICS
    → Open LingQ lesson edit menu → image
    → Click ROOSTER LESSON EDITOR button underneath “Notes Viewer”


ROOSTER LESSON EDITOR V1.21 PATCH NOTES
Bug fixes and idea implementations from 1.20

Again with many thanks to @wadeack @jpp025 and @asad100101 for their ideas and contributions.

VIDEO OF NEW PATCH
RESIZABLE CONTAINERS
WORD WRAP TOGGLE
SENTENCE EVERYTHING
SMART DATA UPDATES
TIME STAMP ROUNDING
BUG FIXES
AUTOMATIC UPDATES

    FEATURES
    → Add/Delete/Modify text of the lesson in a block format
    → Select if each line is paragraph header or a sentence → EXAMPLE 3
    → Split existing lines
    → Copy and Delete all lines in a lesson
    → Text Box is set for target language
    → Modify lesson translations
    → Modify and generate new timestamps
    → Playback audio fragments


KNOWN BUGS:
    → Multi line deleting by highlighting doesn’t save
    → Cannot paste on a new line, move cursor to end of previous line and paste.
